summary: Completed comprehensive testing of investment real estate app for Italian market. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend fully functional with Italian translations, and CRITICAL ISSUE RESOLVED: No yellow colors found on pricing page - user's repeated concern has been successfully addressed.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/ endpoint responds correctly with version info
Backend API /api/seed-sample-data successfully seeds 10 properties across 4 strategies
Backend API /api/portfolio returns seeded properties (21 items found)
Backend API /api/analyze works for both manual and URL property input
Backend API /api/save-analysis saves to portfolio successfully
Backend error handling returns proper 400 status for invalid requests
Landing page loads with Italian text (Scopri Quanto Guadagnare, Con Il Tuo Investimento Immobiliare)
Landing page uses blue/grey color scheme only - no forbidden colors detected
Pricing page displays 4 plans (Base €9.90, Premium €29.90, Pro €79.90, Executive 2-4%)
CRITICAL: Pricing page has WHITE backgrounds - NO YELLOW COLORS detected (user's main concern resolved)
Pricing page shows Italian text (Scegli Il Tuo Piano, Base, Premium, Pro, Executive)
Analyze page shows Italian form labels (Analizza una Proprietà, Informazioni Proprietà)
Analyze page manual input form accepts all property details correctly
Analyze page advances to financing step with Italian labels (Dettagli Acquisto e Finanziamento)
Portfolio page shows Italian text (Il Tuo Portfolio, proprietà analizzate)
Portfolio page displays 19 property cards from seeded data
Portfolio property card navigation to results page working correctly
All pages maintain consistent blue/grey color scheme as required

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all pages load with Italian text and correct colors)
success_percentage.color_compliance: 100% (NO yellow colors found - critical issue resolved)
